Synopsis:
In Dracula (1979), the legendary vampire arrives in Victorian England and begins a dark seduction that threatens to consume everything. With striking presence and haunting romance, Frank Langella redefines the classic role in this gothic reimagining of Bram Stoker’s tale.

description:
You can’t rewrite the past, but you can start again. Watch the trailer for #RemindersOfHim now.

From Colleen Hoover, the best-selling author of It Ends With Us. Only in theaters March 13.

There was before you and there was during you. For some reason, I never thought there would be an after you.

The literary phenomenon from #1 New York Times bestselling author Colleen Hoover becomes a transformative feature film about motherhood, forgiveness and the power of love to overcome even the worst mistake. 

After a perfect outing with her boyfriend, Kenna (Maika Monroe; The Hand that Rocks the Cradle, Longlegs) makes an unbearable mistake that sends her to prison. Seven years later, Kenna returns to her hometown in Wyoming, hoping to reb
